scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder includes several receipts and bills belonging to John Wesley Hunt of Lexington, Kentucky, for goods and services; Hunt's account statements with other business owners; a statement of fish sales by Benjamin Gratz in a joint account with John W. Hunt; and a court order mandating that Holderman, Pearson, and Co. pay David B. Allen $5.16 for traveling and spending five days as a witness in their lawsuit.
